text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: Today we have prepared three types of tea leaves. Assam, Dimbula, and Lapsang Souchong for flavor.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: All of them are highly aromatic, It has an elegant taste suitable for everyone.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Thank you for having me. Not only the tea, but also the tea foods have wonderful colors.

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: Yes. Your pastries sparkling under the sunlight, they look as beautiful as jewels.
A table manners test. There is a single person who is out of place at the "tea party of the young ladies" that is unfolding before my eyes.
I am the only trainer here. The other is nowhere to be seen. I'm sure the other are taking the test in another place, or on another day.
I don't think I'll ever get used to this unique atmosphere. I was so nervous that I drank all my tea without a second thought.
This tea party is hosted by Daiichi Ruby. The act of pouring for yourself is…
choice_data_list: Ahem, what a splendid tea ceremony…

text_block_list.text: ……I feel like this way of saying it is not right, but the act of pouring it yourself must have definitely been a violation of manners.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: ……Thank you very much.
With that, Daiichi Ruby pours me another cup of tea. ……But that feeling relief was short-lived――

text_block_list.name: Ruby's butler
text_block_list.text: Ladies, it's time for dinner. The car will pick you up over there.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: Yes. It is also the venue for the next test. Now, let's go.
I was brought to a place I had never been before, a luxury cruise ship that I had only seen in photographs.
choice_data_list: (What am I supposed to do in a place like this?)

text_block_list.text: It almost make me panic. ―but.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: I was deeply moved when I read your work "Dignity Spoken to the Present Day". In particular, the "continuation'' that is the proposition of chapter 2―

text_block_list.name: Classy woman
text_block_list.text: ―Ahh, I'm glad you noticed that. That part is exactly like your grandmother and mother.

text_block_list.name: Classy woman
text_block_list.text: The glorious history she left behind as a Horse girl… the glory of her family. So Ruby-san, you understand what I mean right?

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: Of course. From now on, our family will continue to unwaveringly continue its glory.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: I have heard from my mother about your cutting-edge activities. I also, have learned much from you―

text_block_list.name: Men in suits
text_block_list.text: ―Hoho, I'm honored to hear you say that far. However, compared to your grandmothers achievement, I still have a long way to go.

text_block_list.name: Men in suits
text_block_list.text: A great horse girl who boasts not only the URA award but also many other honors. That brilliance passed from your grandmother to your mother and now to you.

text_block_list.name: Men in suits
text_block_list.text: We have high hopes for you, Lady Daiichi Ruby.
Daiichi Ruby stands proudly unwaveringly in front of the heavy pressure of the business world. ……completely different from myself.
If you look around, you will see numerous eyes following her… Inside of them, it contain a great expectation for her Noble family.
How much pressure would that be? No matter how calm she may look, she must be under a lot of pressure.
And yet, how can you still look so dignified――

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: …Lift your face. If you're going to do something, always do it with dignity.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: Do you have anything to be ashamed of? If not, you should be the best you can be, stand tall, and look straight ahead.
"If you have something to aspire to, then behave accordingly. That is what will eventually transforms you into who you aspire to be."
…I see, so that's what she mean.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: Be brilliant. Be supreme. Always shine the brightest. That is my family's motto… therefore

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: There is no way I will ever betray your expectations.
Before I knew it, I couldn't take my eyes off Daiichi Ruby, who had declare her will straight forwardly.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: Good job for today. Well then, I still have training, so please excuse me.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: Yes. You are free to go home. For tomorrow's test―
choice_data_list: Is there anything I can help you with!?

text_block_list.text: I said it without thinking. I may not be a trainer worthy of a Daiichi Ruby, that's my honest thought after going through so many test.
However, when I think about the burden she's carrying. I can't help but thinking, I wish I could be of some help…

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: There is nothing in particular.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
choice_data_list: Ah… I want to measure your time!!

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: …Do as you wish.
I felt something changed inside me that day. Daiichi Ruby's words may have been the trigger.
